reviewText: FIVE STARS! This is the best movie of all time.

I tell everyone to watch these movies when they complain nobody makes good movies anymore. No famous stars, no ridiculously expensive effects, all movie awesomeness. This is the way movies were meant to be made. Great scripts with great acting. Anyone who doesn't like these  films is an idiot who is to blame for everything wrong with the world. The world will fail if you don't watch these films again and again. Buy them now. Buy them as gifts. Buy them so true independent film can continue to be made. Buy them before all independent films are only based  on what stars are in them. Buy them  because the other reviewer was right, two of the greatest films of all time,  Citizen kane just got knocked to number 3. Buy them because these movies will automatically make you awesome just for owning them. Buy them to support Annum and Troma. These movies make the world a better place so buy them now. Buy them because I really really want to see slashening 2.
Hilarious Horror Comedy from Annum Films! So glad is is finally available on Blu Ray.
Arguably the two greatest films ever made.
